name: Add Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet rows for new CallTrackingMetrics calls
description: Every time a new call is received in your CallTrackingMetrics, Make will automatically add it as a row to your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet. Here's the [worksheet](https://dnu-my.sharepoint.com/:x:/g/personal/ivanov_d_donnu_edu_ua1/EYwfwXl_MLhGj_JgWqzj5sAB18emYWP19qnmIOuNFTSD6w?e=O5qxDV) used in this scenario.
